metadataAttributes.Title: Information Gathering and Vetting
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Information is key to every decision and every strategic move you make. But ensuring you have the right information takes work. Don’t look in every direction for an answer, and don’t force the solution you’re looking for. Instead, you can use a hypothesis and test it with data until the data fits the situation you’re looking at.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Getting the most of data you collect,Collecting data with a hypothesis,Sharing new insights from data,
